description: [``botocore``] Update ce client to latest version
[``botocore``] Add the ability to disable fetching credentials from EC2 metadata by setting the environment variable AWS_EC2_METADATA_DISABLED to 'true'.
[``botocore``] Update config client to latest version
[``botocore``] Update elasticbeanstalk client to latest version
[``botocore``] Update glue client to latest version
[``botocore``] Update medialive client to latest version
[``botocore``] Fix a race condition related to assuming a role for the first time (`#1405 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/1405>`__)
[``botocore``] Update events client to latest version
[``botocore``] Update ecs client to latest version
